definition: to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]

sentences.english: Million account Qionglu drunk, shadow star shake and crumble.
sentences.chinese: 千軍萬帳中酣歌豪飲人早已醉，滿天繁星搖搖欲墜。

sentences.english: As young adults die, agriculture and industry falter.
sentences.chinese: 因爲年輕人大量凋零，農業與工業也搖搖欲墜。

sentences.english: The international architecture designed to deal with such circumstances is creaking.
sentences.chinese: 專爲應對此類情況而設計的國際架構搖搖欲墜。

sentences.english: Once the foolhardy are teetering on the precipice, it is too late for smugness.
sentences.chinese: 一旦他們在懸崖上搖搖欲墜，那就真的爲時太晚。

sentences.english: You will die wu, I also the crumbling.
sentences.chinese: 你將逝亡，我亦搖搖欲墜。

sentences.english: To walk or move unsteadily or unsurely;
sentences.chinese: 搖搖欲墜搖擺的或不穩定地行走或移動。

sentences.english: It shows Isaac Newton sitting beneath a tree with an apple dangling precariously above his head.
sentences.chinese: 標識上是牛頓坐在樹下，頭上一個蘋果搖搖欲墜。

sentences.english: Greece stood at the brink of bankruptcy and other countries were starting to teeter.
sentences.chinese: 希臘政府瀕臨破產，其他國家的經濟也是搖搖欲墜。

sentences.english: You should teeter on the brink of failure.
sentences.chinese: 你會在失敗的邊沿搖搖欲墜地行走。

sentences.english: It is difficult to traverse the shaky bridge.
sentences.chinese: 那座搖搖欲墜的橋不好過。

sentences.english: Bathe small Yuan whether ambition presently the blossom shriveling away is common, the entire individual is always tottering.
sentences.chinese: 沐小小宛若即將枯萎的花朵一般，整個人都搖搖欲墜。

sentences.english: A straggle of crumbling buildings is all that remains of this hill-side village.
sentences.chinese: 一些散亂的搖搖欲墜的建築便是這山村留下的一切。

sentences.english: Their teeter when stepping onto the bank is extremely lovely.
sentences.chinese: 當他們踏上搖搖欲墜的銀行是非常可愛的。

sentences.english: You crossed the little stream over a rickety bridge of bamboo and mud.
sentences.chinese: 你跨過一座搖搖欲墜的竹橋和泥淖渡過那條小溪。

sentences.english: The villagers shored up sagging huts.
sentences.chinese: 目前我們都在支撐搖搖欲墜的經濟。

sentences.english: The trail of bodies led him to a crumbling stone temple.
sentences.chinese: 該機構的線索使他搖搖欲墜的石廟。

definition: dangers spring up all around (idiom); surrounded by perils
lit. shocks the eye, astonishes the heart (idiom); shocking/horrible to see/a ghastly sight
lintel (of a door)/fig. family's social status
